heading: AWS Community Day
content: DITU ACM Student Chapter will be organizing an event “AWS Community Day Dehradun 2025”  in collaboration with AWS User Group Dehradun. It aimed to build an environment connecting people through innovation, ideas and inspiration.

heading: GIT LINKED
content: DITU ACM Student Chapter organized an event “GIT LINKED” which was an offline Workshop on the famous version control system Git and GitHub. The aim of the event was to encourage the awareness of open source among the participants.

heading: CS101
content: DITU ACM SC organized there Flagship Event “CS101” on 10th of August, 2024. The Event was organized with a motive of spreading the knowledge about Tech and various feilds in ii that are used to make such bots , among the students and also make them aware about the insights of robotics.

heading: WHAT THE HACK?
content: DITU ACM Student Chapter organized an event “WHAT THE HACK” which was an offline Cyber Security workshop. The aim of the workshop was to help students kick start their journey with Cyber security.

heading: CS-101 2022
content: The theme of the event was to inform beginners about various fields in computer science, including cyber security, machine learning, IoT, app development, data science, and UI/UX design. To achieve this, we invited experts from these fields to speak at the event.

heading: HACK ON HILLS
content: DITU ACM Student Chapter organized an event “HACK ON HILLS” on Youthopia 2022which was an offline CTF based Cybersecurity Event. The aim of the event was to identify Cybersecurity enthusiasts and motivate them in this journey.

heading: GIT & GITHUB
content: DITU ACM Student Chapter organized an event “GIT AND GITHUB 2022” which was an online Git and GitHub workshop. The aim of the workshop was to help students kick start their journey with Git , GitHub and Open Source

heading: BLINDCODE
content: ACM organized an event Blind code is where a programmer works on code without running it until completion. Normally this is a terrible idea but it makes for a very fun challenge.
